sub_topic: Synthesis and characterization of coordination compounds
message_1: What is the ratio of nickel to ligands in the coordination compound [Ni(en)2Cl2]?
message_2:
In the coordination compound [Ni(en)2Cl2], there is 1 nickel (Ni) atom, 2 ethylenediamine (en) ligands, and 2 chloride (Cl) ligands. 

The ratio of nickel to ligands can be calculated as follows:

1 Ni : (2 en + 2 Cl)

So, the ratio of nickel to ligands in the coordination compound [Ni(en)2Cl2] is 1:4.
